Title: María Jesús Cortés concert in La Mano Verde
Description: On Friday, June 13th, we’ll enjoy a performance by María Jesús Cortés at La Mano Verde — a singer-songwriter whose sound blends flamenco, Cuban son, and roots music.
Keywords: María Jesús Cortés, concert in Cortelazor, La Mano Verde, live music, Spanish singer-songwriter, art and nature, cultural events Cortelazor, Sierra de Aracena
